home.title: React Bitfinity PWA
home.subtitle: simple progresive web app template
home.section1text1: Load instantly and never show the downasaur, even in uncertain network conditions.
home.section1text11: When launched from the user’s home screen, service workers enable a Progressive Web App to load instantly, regardless of the network state.
home.section1text2: Respond quickly to user interactions with silky smooth animations
home.section1text22: 53% of users will abandon a site if it takes longer than 3 seconds to load! And once loaded, users expect them to be fast—no janky scrolling or slow-to-respond interfaces.
home.section1text3: Feel like a natural app on the device, with an immersive user experience.
home.section1text33: Progressive Web Apps are installable and live on the user's home screen, without the need for an app store. They offer an immersive full screen experience with help from a web app manifest file and can even re-engage users with web push notifications.
home.section1summary: These three experiences were listed by Google as the crucial qualites of every Progresive Web App.
home.section2subtitle: Check cool features out of the box
home.section2feature1: a predictable state container for JavaScript apps
home.section2feature3: as its name says, component animate elements on scroll with animate.css library
home.section2feature4: an easy way to perform animations when a React component enters or leaves the DOM
home.section2feature5: the web's most popular icon set and toolkit
